entity.name: legislation
entity.query: SELECT leg.id as `legislation_id`, leg.session, leg.state, leg.type, leg.number, leg.external_id, leg.title, leg.abstract, leg.sponsor_name, leg.sponsor_url, leg.status_standardkey, leg.status_standard_val, leg.status_val, it.id as import_id, it.xml_import_timestamp FROM legislation leg INNER JOIN ( SELECT legislation.id as `bill_id`, max(imports.id) as `import_id` FROM import_table imports INNER JOIN v_import_bills ON v_import_bills.entity_type = 'legislation' AND imports.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' AND imports.id = `v_import_bills`.`import_id` INNER JOIN legislation ON v_import_bills.entity_id = legislation.id GROUP BY legislation.id ) import ON leg.id = import.bill_id INNER JOIN import_table it ON import.import_id = it.id where exists (select 1 from vw_active_session act WHERE leg.session = act.session_name and leg.state = act.session_state limit 1);

entity.name: priority
entity.query: SELECT IF (COUNT(id) = 0,0,1) as priority FROM prioritized_bills WHERE bill_id = '${legislation.legislation_id}' AND client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' AND entity_type='legislation';

entity.name: entity_text
entity.query: SELECT url as path FROM text_file WHERE text_file.entity_id = '${legislation.external_id}';

entity.name: profile_match
entity.query: SELECT profile_match.id as pmid, profile.profile_name as pname,profile.entity_type,entity_id FROM profile_match JOIN profile ON profile.id = profile_match.profile_id AND profile.entity_type = 'legislation' AND profile.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' WHERE profile_match.entity_id = '${legislation.legislation_id}'

entity.name: profile_keyword
entity.query: SELECT keyword FROM profile_keyword WHERE profile_keyword.profile_match_id= '${profile_match.pmid}'

entity.name: profile_match
entity.query: SELECT profile_match.id as pmid, profile.profile_name as hidden_profile, profile.entity_type,entity_id FROM profile_match JOIN profile ON profile.id = profile_match.profile_id AND profile.entity_type = 'legislation' AND profile.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hidden_bills WHERE hidden_bills.profile_id = profile.id LIMIT 1) AND profile_match.entity_id = '${legislation.legislation_id}'

entity.name: profile_match
entity.query: SELECT profile_match.id as pmid, profile.profile_name as active_profile, profile.entity_type,entity_id FROM profile_match JOIN profile ON profile.id = profile_match.profile_id AND profile.entity_type = 'legislation' AND profile.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hidden_bills WHERE hidden_bills.profile_id = profile.id LIMIT 1) AND profile_match.entity_id = '${legislation.legislation_id}'

entity.name: regulation
entity.query: SELECT reg.id as `regulation_id`, reg.external_id, reg.tracking_key, reg.code_citation, reg.state, reg.agency_name, reg.type, reg.state_action_type, reg.register_date, it.id as `import_id`, it.xml_import_timestamp FROM regulation reg INNER JOIN ( SELECT regulation.id as `reg_id`, max(imports.id) as `import_id` FROM import_table imports INNER JOIN v_import_bills ON v_import_bills.entity_type = 'regulation' AND imports.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' AND imports.id = `v_import_bills`.`import_id` INNER JOIN regulation ON v_import_bills.entity_id = regulation.id GROUP BY regulation.id ) import ON reg.id = import.reg_id INNER JOIN import_table it ON import.import_id = it.id;

entity.name: priority
entity.query: SELECT IF (COUNT(id) = 0,0,1) as priority FROM prioritized_bills WHERE bill_id = '${regulation.regulation_id}' AND client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' AND entity_type='regulation';

entity.name: entity_text
entity.query: SELECT url as path FROM text_file WHERE text_file.entity_id = '${regulation.regulation_id}' AND entity_type = 'regulation';

entity.name: profile_match
entity.query: SELECT profile_match.id as pmid, profile.profile_name as pname,profile.entity_type,entity_id FROM profile_match JOIN profile ON profile.id = profile_match.profile_id AND profile.entity_type = 'regulation' AND profile.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' WHERE profile_match.entity_id = '${regulation.regulation_id}'

entity.name: profile_keyword
entity.query: SELECT keyword FROM profile_keyword WHERE profile_keyword.profile_match_id= '${profile_match.pmid}'

entity.name: profile_match
entity.query: SELECT profile_match.id as pmid, profile.profile_name as hidden_profile, profile.entity_type,entity_id FROM profile_match JOIN profile ON profile.id = profile_match.profile_id AND profile.entity_type = 'regulation' AND profile.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hidden_bills WHERE hidden_bills.profile_id = profile.id LIMIT 1) AND profile_match.entity_id = '${regulation.regulation_id}'

entity.name: profile_match
entity.query: SELECT profile_match.id as pmid, profile.profile_name as active_profile, profile.entity_type,entity_id FROM profile_match JOIN profile ON profile.id = profile_match.profile_id AND profile.entity_type = 'regulation' AND profile.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hidden_bills WHERE hidden_bills.profile_id = profile.id LIMIT 1) AND profile_match.entity_id = '${regulation.regulation_id}'

entity.name: hearing
entity.query: SELECT hrg.id as `hearing_id`, hrg.state, hrg.legislation_external_id,legislation.session as leg_session,legislation.state as leg_state, hrg.house, hrg.committee, hrg.date, hrg.time, hrg.place, it.id as import_id, it.xml_import_timestamp FROM hearing hrg INNER JOIN ( SELECT hearing.id as `hrg_id`, max(imports.id) as import_id FROM import_table imports INNER JOIN v_import_bills ON v_import_bills.entity_type = 'hearing' AND imports.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' AND imports.id = `v_import_bills`.`import_id` INNER JOIN hearing ON v_import_bills.entity_id = hearing.id GROUP BY hearing.id ) import ON hrg.id = import.hrg_id INNER JOIN import_table it ON import.import_id = it.id JOIN legislation ON legislation.external_id = hrg.legislation_external_id where exists (select 1 from vw_active_session act WHERE legislation.session = act.session_name and legislation.state = act.session_state limit 1);

entity.name: priority
entity.query: SELECT IF (COUNT(id) = 0,0,1) as priority FROM prioritized_bills WHERE bill_id = '${hearing.hearing_id}' AND client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' AND entity_type='hearing';

entity.query: SELECT profile_match.id as pmid, profile.profile_name as active_profile, profile.entity_type,entity_id FROM profile_match JOIN profile ON profile.id = profile_match.profile_id AND profile.entity_type = 'hearing' AND profile.client_id = '${dataimporter.request.core_client_id}' WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM hidden_bills WHERE hidden_bills.profile_id = profile.id LIMIT 1) AND profile_match.entity_id = '${hearing.hearing_id}'
